# interactionShouldBegin(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate whether the text interaction should begin.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func interactionShouldBegin(_ interaction: UITextInteraction, at point: CGPoint) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **interaction**: The text interaction that called this method.
- **point**: The position on the screen where the user is touching.

## Return Value

A Boolean value indicating whether the interaction should begin. Return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to let the interaction begin; otherwise, return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to prevent the interaction from beginning.

## Handling text interaction events

- **interactionWillBegin(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the text interaction will begin.
- **interactionDidEnd(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the text interaction ended.
